name: Timey Wimey Gun
description:
The year is 4XXX. All known laws of physics have been overturned and resigned by committee. You've received a mysterious invite to a certain famous game show, the Timey Wimey Gun challenge... Probably should have read the contract before signing it though, because now you're trapped in an infinite time loop until you escape. Talk about a content farm. 

A game jam game made for the Stop Waiting for Godot game jam. 

Code by https://alannakelly.itch.io/

Art and Level Design by https://sophiaimpetus.itch.io/
